snippet.title: Meet Crypto – Apex Legends Character Trailer
snippet.description:
Forced to abandon his identity after being blamed for crimes he didn’t commit, Crypto is a brilliant hacker with plenty of secrets to keep. He uses specialized surveillance drones to stay in the fight and out of the spotlight, while his Neurolink marks enemies for him and his teammates, and the drone’s unleashed EMP takes out those in a fortified position. Play him in Season 3 and get off the grid!
 
Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Origin for PC: http://x.ea.com/57366.
 
Learn more about Crypto: http://x.ea.com/58899.
 
Check out our YouTube channel: http://x.ea.com/56710.
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playapex.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playapex/.
